name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

key_work.title: The Favourite
key_work.creator_credit: Ceci Dempsey, Ed Guiney, Lee Magiday and Yorgos Lanthimos
key_work.headline_credit: Ireland, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018

video_links.name: THE FAVOURITE | Official Trailer | FOX Searchlight

key_work.brief_description: England, early 18th century. The close relationship between Queen Anne and Sarah Churchill is threatened by the arrival of Sarah’s cousin, Abigail Hill, resulting in a bitter rivalry between the two cousins to be the Queen’s favourite.

constellations_primary.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_primary.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

constellations_other.name: Creating characters with Great costumes
constellations_other.description: Emma Fryer's costume design for The Great took inspiration from both accurate finery of the period, and contemporary designs of fashion houses like Dior. The resulting costumes evolve with the characters.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge.

constellations_other.name: Dress to impress
constellations_other.description: In The Great, Peter and Catherine’s costumes during their Dacha visit are designed to demonstrate their unity, as they negotiate with the Swedish royals. Clothes have long been a way to communicate power, particularly in politics.

constellations_other.name: Power and privilege, monarchy and make-up
constellations_other.description: The upper echelons of society explored through colour, make-up and scandal.

constellations_other.name: Fish-eyes and fun times
constellations_other.description: This Constellation starts with The Favourite and ends up at Rambo, and was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

constellations_other.name: Making films in black and white
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

start.title: The Act

video_links.name: The Act: Trailer (Official) • A Hulu Original

start.brief_description: A seasonal anthology series that tells startling, stranger-than-fiction true crime stories with the first season following Gypsy Blanchard, a girl trying to escape the toxic relationship she has with her overprotective mother.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

end.title: Mommy Dead and Dearest
end.creator_credit: Andrew Rossi, Erin Lee Carr and Abstract

video_links.name: Mommy Dead and Dearest (HBO Documentary Films)

end.brief_description: Child abuse, mental illness, and forbidden love converge in this mystery involving a mother and daughter who were thought to be living a fairy tale life that turned out to be a living nightmare.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: The Act followed a mother with Munchausen syndrome by proxy – played by Arquette – who was eventually killed by her daughter’s boyfriend. The true story fascinated America and was examined in Mommy Dead And Dearest by documentarian Erin Lee Carr.

end.title: The Lobster
end.creator_credit: Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Ceci Dempsey, Ed Guiney, Lee Magiday, Yorgos Lanthimos, CNC and Haut et Court
end.headline_credit: France, Greece, Ireland, Netherlands and United Kingdom, 2015

video_links.name: The Lobster | Official Trailer HD | Film4

end.brief_description: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: Renowned costume designer Sandy Powell brought characters to life with her work in The Favourite by Yorgos Lanthimos. The Greek filmmaker gave viewers a surreal, dystopian version of courtship in The Lobster.

start.title: The Lobster
start.creator_credit: Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Ceci Dempsey, Ed Guiney, Lee Magiday, Yorgos Lanthimos, CNC and Haut et Court
start.headline_credit: France, Greece, Ireland, Netherlands and United Kingdom, 2015

video_links.name: The Lobster | Official Trailer HD | Film4

start.brief_description: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.

constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

end.title: Attenberg
end.creator_credit: Angelos Venetis, Athina Rachel Tsangari, Iraklis Mavroidis, Maria Hatzakou, Yorgos Lanthimos and Stefi S.A.
end.brief_description: Marina, 23, is growing up with her architect father by the sea. Finding the human species strange and repellent, she keeps her distance, instead observing life through the songs of Suicide, David Attenborough documentaries, and the sexual-education lessons she receives from her only friend, Bella.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: The Lobster was largely considered Lanthimos’s breakthrough film and was nominated for a Best Original Screenplay Academy Award. His partner, Ariane Labed, received a thank you in the film. She starred in the critically acclaimed Attenberg.

start.title: Attenberg
start.creator_credit: Angelos Venetis, Athina Rachel Tsangari, Iraklis Mavroidis, Maria Hatzakou, Yorgos Lanthimos and Stefi S.A.
start.brief_description: Marina, 23, is growing up with her architect father by the sea. Finding the human species strange and repellent, she keeps her distance, instead observing life through the songs of Suicide, David Attenborough documentaries, and the sexual-education lessons she receives from her only friend, Bella.

end.title: Before Midnight
end.creator_credit: Athina Rachel Tsangari, Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Richard Linklater and Sara Woodhatch
end.headline_credit: Greece and United States of America, 2013
end.brief_description: It has been nine years since we last met Jesse and Celine, the French-American couple who once met on a train in Vienna. Now, live in Paris with twin daughters, but have spent a summer in Greece on the invitation of an author colleague of Jesse’s. When the vacation is over and Jesse must send his teenage son off to the States, he begins to question his life decisions, and his relationship with Celine is at risk.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: Attenberg was written, directed and produced by Athina Rachel Tsangari whose work has influenced indie fillmakers the Duplass Brothers and Richard Linklater. Both she and the star of Attenberg – Labed – appeared in Linklater’s Before Midnight.

start.title: Before Midnight
start.creator_credit: Athina Rachel Tsangari, Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Richard Linklater and Sara Woodhatch
start.headline_credit: Greece and United States of America, 2013
start.brief_description: It has been nine years since we last met Jesse and Celine, the French-American couple who once met on a train in Vienna. Now, live in Paris with twin daughters, but have spent a summer in Greece on the invitation of an author colleague of Jesse’s. When the vacation is over and Jesse must send his teenage son off to the States, he begins to question his life decisions, and his relationship with Celine is at risk.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

end.title: Boyhood
end.creator_credit: Cathleen Sutherland, John Sloss, Jonathan Sehring and Richard Linklater
end.brief_description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: Before Midnight was the conclusion to the Before trilogy, which was the brainchild of Linklater, Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy, and spanned several decades. Linklater also toyed with time in Boyhood.

start.title: Boyhood
start.creator_credit: Cathleen Sutherland, John Sloss, Jonathan Sehring and Richard Linklater
start.brief_description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

end.title: The Act

video_links.name: The Act: Trailer (Official) • A Hulu Original

end.brief_description: A seasonal anthology series that tells startling, stranger-than-fiction true crime stories with the first season following Gypsy Blanchard, a girl trying to escape the toxic relationship she has with her overprotective mother.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

links.description: Boyhood was filmed over the course of 12 years, charting the course of couple’s relationship as played by Patricia Arquette and Ethan Hawke. Arquette also starred in television mini-series The Act.
